ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('pPrefikPajak = '&IF({0,6}='' OR ISNULL({0,6}),'',Trim({0,6}))&' || pDocEntry = '&IF({0,21}=0 OR ISNULL({0,21}),'',Trim(Str({0,21},'15')))&' || pETaxNumber = '&IF({0,22}='' OR ISNULL({0,22}),'',Trim({0,22}))&' ||')

MlsTrans('gCompany = '&IF(Trim({32768,99})='' OR ISNULL(Trim({32768,99})),'Data Kosong',Trim({32768,99}))&' || DOCENTRY = '&IF(ISNULL(Trim(Str({0,16},'15'))),'0',Trim(Str({0,16},'15')))&' || DOCNUM = '&IF(ISNULL(Trim(Str({0,17},'15'))),'0',Trim(Str({0,17},'15')))&' || ')
